subject: Cannot access CloudSync after go-live
description: Tried logging in at shift start but getting SSO error. Need access to patient files urgently.

subject: SSO loop - keeps redirecting
description: Click login and it just keeps sending me back to the login screen. Tried 3 browsers.

subject: Images not syncing to workstations
description: DICOM images uploaded 2 hours ago still not visible on reading workstations. Radiologists waiting.

subject: How do I share a folder externally?
description: Missed the training session - need to share budget docs with external auditor by Monday

subject: CloudSync running extremely slow
description: Entire lab department reporting 30+ second delays opening files. Unusable.

subject: Patient care plans not migrated
description: Looking for care plans we created last week - not in CloudSync. WHERE ARE THEY?

subject: Epic integration showing errors
description: Epic connector throwing timeout errors. Clinical staff can't access EMR-linked documents.

subject: Can't see shared pharmacy protocols folder
description: Had access before migration - now folder not visible. Need for medication verification.

subject: Login working but very slow
description: Takes 45 seconds to authenticate. During emergencies this is not acceptable.

subject: Request: Offline access for executives
description: Leadership wants to access files during travel without internet. Is this possible?

subject: Surgical schedules missing
description: Weekly OR schedules we uploaded yesterday are gone. Surgery starts in 2 hours!

subject: Can't open large imaging studies
description: PACS-linked studies over 500MB won't open at all. Getting timeout error.

subject: Need refresher on version history
description: Training covered this but I forgot - how do I see old versions of a document?

subject: Staff showing wrong department access
description: Three nurses see files from other departments they shouldn't have access to.

subject: Audit log not showing all events
description: Compliance team noticed gaps in audit log from 6-8 AM. Need complete records.

subject: Still slow after earlier fix
description: Performance was better for an hour but now slow again. Is this going to be ongoing?

subject: ServiceNow tickets not creating
description: When I report an issue through CloudSync it's supposed to create a ticket. It's not.

subject: Department threatening to go back to paper
description: Multiple issues this morning. Staff saying the old system was better. Need exec intervention.

subject: Files syncing but metadata wrong
description: Documents showing wrong dates and authors after sync. Confusing for audit trail.

subject: Requesting status update for board
description: Board meeting Tuesday - CIO needs summary of go-live status and any concerns.

subject: Confusion about shared vs personal folders
description: Staff uploading personal files to shared department folder. Need clarification.

subject: Opening case files takes too long
description: Between surgeries need quick access. Current speed not acceptable for clinical use.

subject: Overwhelmed with CloudSync calls
description: Help desk has taken 35 CloudSync calls today. Need additional support resources.

subject: Sporadic SSO failures overnight
description: 3 staff reported login failures between 2-4 AM. Working now but concerning.

subject: Slow but better than yesterday
description: Still noticing delays but more like 5-10 seconds now vs 30 yesterday. Improving?

subject: Large study issue still not fixed
description: Ticket HF-012 from yesterday - still can't open big imaging files. When is fix coming?

subject: Can we get mobile app access?
description: Would be helpful to check drug reference docs from phones during rounds.

subject: Mixed feedback from staff
description: Some nurses love it others want the old system. Is there additional training available?

subject: Epic connector warnings in logs
description: Not causing visible issues but seeing warnings in Epic integration logs. Proactive flag.

subject: Need confirmation audit logs complete
description: Following up on HF-015 - need written confirmation all audit events captured for HIPAA.

subject: Files taking longer to sync than expected
description: Upload something and it takes 5 minutes to appear on other workstations. Is that normal?

subject: Wanted to apologize and thank team
description: Things much better today. Staff calming down. Thanks for quick response yesterday.

subject: Minor sync delay noticed
description: Small delays this morning but resolved on their own. Just documenting for record.

subject: Performance has stabilized
description: Just wanted to confirm things are working well now. Big improvement from Saturday.

subject: Requesting week 1 metrics summary
description: Need to compile report for CIO. Can you provide ticket counts and resolution times?

subject: CIO very pleased with recovery
description: Michael wanted me to pass along that he's impressed with how team handled the rough start.

subject: Requests for additional training sessions
description: Several departments asking for follow-up training now that they've used system a few days.

subject: Large file issue finally resolved
description: The patch worked - can now open big imaging studies. Thank you for prioritizing this.

subject: Epic integration fully stable
description: No warnings in logs for 48 hours. Integration running smoothly.

subject: Clinical leadership satisfied
description: Dr. Williams reports clinical staff have adapted well. Initial concerns addressed.

subject: Staff now preferring new system
description: ICU nurses saying search is much better than old system. Positive feedback.

subject: Official feedback: much improved from Day 1
description: Department formally withdrawing concerns from Day 1. System working well for clinical care.

subject: Week 1 officially complete - stable
description: Closing out hypercare week 1. All critical issues resolved. System stable.

subject: Request to discuss case study participation
description: Michael interested in participating in CloudSync case study. Please have marketing reach out.

subject: End of Week 1 Survey: 72% satisfied
description: Survey results in - 72% satisfied or very satisfied. Up from estimated 40% on Day 1.

subject: Board update well received
description: Michael's board presentation on CloudSync deployment received positive feedback.

subject: IT team commended for handling go-live
description: CIO formally thanked IT team for managing through difficult first 48 hours.
